title: Haunted Discoveries
overview: Based in Kentucky, IL, Haunted Discoveries begins as a hunt for a paranormal research facility in what is America's most haunted state and turns into a journey filled with mysterious and heartwarming discoveries for a team of supernatural investigators. The series looks at some of Kentucky's most jaw-dropping sites and explores whether they might be tied to unique natural anomalies as old as the earth itself, and questions whether the state's unique history and rich culture might have intensified paranormal activity.
